name: Spooky Slayer
description:
Game Information

Spooky Slayer 2 HD REMIX Remastered  is a less than serious, less than totally polished, top down arcade shooter styled with retro graphics and sound. The gameplay is very simple, yet challenging; the player is given four automatic sentries that they can place around and have to reload.

Some Notes...

This game is a complete game, however it may still have some bugs (I fixed all the ones I found, but I'm still learning). This is all mostly to experience what it's like to make a game from start to finish, with audio, music, graphics, and everything all the way up to publishing (here (: ).

Thanks To

  • Unity Technologies for having a free game engine lol
  • https://boscaceoil.net/ for a free music maker
  • https://www.bfxr.net/ for a free sound effect maker
  • My Canadian friend for his amazing art that I probably butchered
